seller_description: The HIT Mosquito Racquet is a reliable solution for keeping your home mosquito-free. Equipped with a 3,500V DC voltage net mesh, it ensures instant mosquito elimination. Crafted from aircraft-grade ABS plastic, the racquet offers exceptional strength and durability. Its 400mAh rechargeable battery provides up to 1 month of standby and can be recharged up to 200 times. The unique shape enhances coverage, especially in corners, while the inbuilt bright LED light aids in spotting mosquitoes in the dark, both indoors and outdoors. Comes with a 6-month warranty; register on the HIT website within 10 days of purchase to claim it.
review: The handle feels flimsy and not as durable as described. Expected better quality for the price paid.
Expected-output: The buyer's review criticizes the build quality of the racquet handle, which contradicts the seller's description of using aircraft-grade ABS plastic for exceptional strength and durability. While the images do not clearly depict the durability, the buyer's experience indicates a discrepancy in the promised quality. The seller is at fault for overpromising on the product's material strength.
label: -1 buyers opinion
